title: What do girls want from boys?
brief_description: An open ended film from the “Searching years” series in which a group of young people discuss the problems of dating at high school level and the needs of girls in a close relationship. Why do girls often prefer to date older boys? What does a girl mean when a ask to be “treated like a woman?”
